channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- VMware Tools
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- VMware Tools

item.title: CVE-2015-5191|2024-08-06T06:41:09.243Z -- vmware -- vmware%20tools
item.description: VMware Tools prior to 10.0.9 contains multiple file system races in libDeployPkg, related to the use of hard-coded paths under /tmp. Successful exploitation of this issue may result in a local privilege escalation. CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:H/PR:L/UI:R/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H
